title: Oazis Reform Etterem
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, American, Pizza, Buffet, Fast food, Salad bar, Take-out, Hungarian
description: A lunch cafe that offers vegetarian buffet food, most of which are traditional Hungarian dishes and most are vegan, including burgers, pizza, vegetarian bean goulash, apricot soup. You could fill a tub for take-out.
